    <ds:content>
      <text:text xmlns:text="http://jazz.net/xmlns/alm/rm/text/v0.1" artifactRole="" type="Supporting Material">
        <text:richTextBody>
          <div>
            <h:div xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
              <h:p style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_4" dir="ltr"> </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_5" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">There are </h:span>
                <h:span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0); font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">23 </h:span>
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">requirements related to Term Deposit that has been taken up for solution in this Functional Specification document. Please refer to the following PSA documents for further details on these requirements:</h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_6" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">
                  <h:b>PSA-TD-002 Payout Renewal Transactions & Reversals</h:b>
                </h:span>
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">.</h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_7" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">
                  <h:b>PSA-TD-003 Penalty & Interest</h:b>
                </h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_8" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">
                  <h:b>PSA-TD-004 Inquiries, Notices & Statements.</h:b>
                </h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_9" dir="ltr">
                <h:span style="font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Also refer to Section 2.1 of this document where the details have been provided from the PSA documents. The functional specification topic-wise breakup of the requirements is as shown below:</h:span>
              </h:p>
              <h:div dir="ltr">
                <h:table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="margin-left: 0px;" id="_10">
                  <h:tbody>
                    <h:tr>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 150px; vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(220, 230, 241);" id="_11">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_12" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">
                            <h:b>Topics</h:b>
                          </h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>
                      <h:td colspan="1" rowspan="1" style="width: 97px; vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(220, 230, 241);" id="_13">
                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_14" dir="ltr">

                            <h:b>Gap</h:b>
                          </h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>

                        <h:p style="text-align: justify; margin-left: 0px;" id="_16" dir="ltr">
                          <h:span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: arial,helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">
                            <h:b>No Gap</h:b>
                          </h:span>
                        </h:p>
                      </h:td>

                    </h:tr>
                    <h:tr>
